text: læa nı thanxng nan rea di hı phwk khea luk khun pheux phwk khea ca tham sung kanlæakan khn hnung nı phwk khea klaw wa “phwk than phanak xyu nan theadı?” Phwk khea klaw wa “rea phak xyu wan hnung hrux swn hnung khxng wan” phwk khea klaw wa “phraphupenceakhxng phwk than thrng thrab di wa phwk than phanak xyu nan theadı dangnan cng sng khn hnung nı hmu phwk than pi nı meuxng phrxm dwy heriyy ngein ni khxng phwk than pheux leuxk du xahar thi di ying læa hı khea sux ma hı kæ phwk than læa hı khea praphvti xyang suphaph læa xya hı phu dı ru reuxng khxng phwk than”
